name: Gene STILP, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, General Assembly, Robert C. Jubelirer, and John M. Perzel, Leadership of the General Assembly, Appellees

parties: Gene STILP, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, General Assembly, Robert C. Jubelirer, and John M. Perzel, Leadership of the General Assembly, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of March, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
946 A.2d 636
Gene STILP, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, General Assembly, Robert C. Jubelirer, and John M. Perzel, Leadership of the General Assembly, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 19, 2008.
